name: Super Pixagon
description:
Info

---------------------------------------------------------------

A small demake of Super Hexagon created for TweetTweetJam 2.

Made in 555 characters from a limit of 560.

Refresh to restart.

Code

---------------------------------------------------------------

a=0t=0s=0.5r=0.005l=1 c=63h={}add(h,{r=99,a=rnd(1)})add(h,{r=99*1.5,a=rnd(1)}) z=sin v=cos ::_::cls()x=c+15*v(a)y=c+15*z(a)circ(c, c, 5, 7)circ(x, y, 1, 8) if(not btn(0) or not btn(1))a+=r if(btn(0))a+=0.03 if(btn(1))a-=0.03 for i=1,#h do o=h[i] q=o.r n=o.a k=c+q*v(n)u=c+q*z(n) for d=1,5 do p=c+q*v(n+d/6)j=c+q*z(n+d/6)line(k,u,p,j,7)k=p u=j end o.a+=r o.r-=s if(q<=6)o.r=99o.a=rnd(1) end if(pget(x,y)==7 or pget(x+v(a),y+z(a))==7 or pget(x-v(a),y-z(a))==7)l=_ t+=1/30s+=0.0005r+=0.00001*(abs(r)/r)if(rnd(1)<=0.01)r=-r ?flr(t),1,1,8 flip() if(l)goto _ Social
